text: Nazrul Islam Politician of Chittagong District of Bangladesh and member of Parliament for Chittagong-11 and Chittagong-7. ==Career== Islam was elected to parliament from Chittagong-11 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 1979. He was elected to parliament from Chittagong-7 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1988. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:People from Chittagong District Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Nazrul Islam (Chittagong politician)
